commandobject.name: PlayAnimation
commandobject.documentation: Will trigger some of the native animations.

property.name: Name
property.documentation: Name of the animation. Possible animations: gesture_beckon, gesture_cheer, gesture_halt, gesture_point, Gesture_Taunt01, PThrust, AssSmack, ThroatCut, Specific_1, Gesture_Taunt02, Idle_Character02, Idle_Character03, Gesture_Taunt03.

property.name: Loop
property.documentation: When true the animation will be played in loop. Supported un GameBotsUE2.
